workflow.name: Generate AI avatar videos from scripts using ElevenLabs and HeyGen
workflow.description:
## üìä Description
Automate end-to-end AI video creation by transforming text scripts into professional avatar videos with natural voiceovers. üé¨ü§ñ This workflow receives a script via webhook, generates realistic audio using ElevenLabs, creates an AI avatar video through HeyGen, continuously polls for completion, and uploads the final MP4 file to Google Drive. The completed video is also returned directly via webhook for frontend or app usage. Perfect for product demos, onboarding videos, explainers, and content platforms that need scalable video generation without manual editing. üöÄüìπ

## üîÅ What This Template Does
1Ô∏è‚É£ Receives a POST request containing script, avatar ID, voice ID, and style via webhook. üåê
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Extracts and validates request parameters for processing. üßæ
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Generates natural-sounding voiceover audio using ElevenLabs. üéôÔ∏è
 4Ô∏è‚É£ Uploads the generated audio file to HeyGen as a video asset. ‚¨ÜÔ∏è
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Creates an AI avatar video using the selected HeyGen avatar and audio track. ü§ñüé•
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Polls HeyGen every few seconds until video generation is complete. ‚è≥
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Retrieves video URLs, captions, thumbnails, and metadata. üìä
 8Ô∏è‚É£ Downloads the finished MP4 video file. ‚¨áÔ∏è
 9Ô∏è‚É£ Uploads the final video to Google Drive with structured naming. ‚òÅÔ∏è
 üîü Returns the video file via webhook response for frontend display or download. üîÅ
 1Ô∏è‚É£1Ô∏è‚É£ Sends Slack alerts automatically if any workflow error occurs. üö®

## ‚≠ê Key Benefits
‚úÖ Converts plain text into studio-quality avatar videos automatically
 ‚úÖ Uses human-like AI voiceovers from ElevenLabs
 ‚úÖ Eliminates manual video recording, editing, and rendering
 ‚úÖ End-to-end automation from script ‚Üí video ‚Üí Drive
 ‚úÖ Frontend-ready with webhook video response
 ‚úÖ Ideal for scalable video content production

## üß© Features
- Webhook-based video generation trigger
- ElevenLabs multilingual text-to-speech integration
- HeyGen AI avatar video creation
- Dynamic avatar, voice, and style selection
- Polling loop to handle async video rendering
- Google Drive video upload
- Binary video return via webhook
- Slack-based error handling and alerts

## üîê Requirements
- ElevenLabs API key (voice generation)
- HeyGen API key (avatar video creation)
- Google Drive OAuth2 credentials
- Slack API credentials (optional, for error alerts)
- Webhook client sending script, avatar_id, voice_id, and video_style

## üéØ Target Audience
- SaaS teams creating onboarding or explainer videos
- Content creators producing AI talking-head videos
- EdTech platforms generating video lessons
- Marketing teams scaling video production
- Automation teams building AI video pipelines

workflow.name: Generate AI avatar videos from scripts using ElevenLabs and HeyGen to Google Drive

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
